weather_app_parts

Class WeatherAppView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • weather_app_parts.WeatherAppView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class WeatherAppView
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class is in charge of presenting the GUI of the program and also reacting to the interactions of the user in the program.
    Author:
    Josefine Bexelius

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WeatherAppView()
      Constructor of the view, creates the GUI components and adds listeners to the programs buttons.
